description: This file defines a Java class ApiRequestContext, which serves as a data container for API request metadata, specifically storing an authorization identifier.

classes.name: ApiRequestContext
classes.description: A simple Java class representing the context of an API request, holding a single authId property.

methods.name: getAuthId
methods.description: Getter method for the authId property.

methods.name: setAuthId
methods.description: Setter method for the authId property.
